scenes.text:
Cardiff University Football Club is one of the strongest, most competitive and most popular within the University, with members from a wide range of academic disciplines. 
The 1st Xl competes with Swansea Univeristy in the annual Welsh Varsity Series.
Our meeting and training schedules are updated frequently, you can come to the trial sessions or email us at MensAFC@Cardiff.ac.uk for information.
We have meets to train, socials with the teams and society members to pubs or club trips. We often have informal games and of course attend Welsh Varsity annually.
